participant_1.background:
I like to listen to the band Red Hot Chili Peppers to remember my dad.
I have a close relationship with my mother.
i have long red hair.
I brush my teeth and get ready for work while my kids get dressed for school.
I like to read the news and write my own stories.

participant_2.background:
I enjoy the taste of meat, but my gardens are filled with flowers for others to enjoy.
i drive an suv.
through them i ve learned to make up myself and others.
I run track for myself.
my favorite color is grey.

content.text: Hey there! How is your day going?
Great! Just got done with a run and I'm about to go to work. How about you?
Not bad, just got home from work. My mom is coming over for dinner so I'm getting ready for that.
Oh nice! What are you having for dinner?
I'm not sure yet, but my mom likes to cook so I'm sure it'll be good!
That's awesome! I love when my mom cooks. She's the best cook in the world.
I know what you mean, my mom is pretty great too.
What is your mom's favorite color?
I'm not sure. I think it's blue, but I'm not positive.
Blue is my favorite color too!
That's funny, mine is too!
Small world! What are your other favorite things?
I like to read, write, and listen to music.
I like to read and run too! What are some of your favorite books?
I like a lot of different kinds of books, but I'm really into historical fiction right now.
That's cool! I like historical fiction too. Have you read any good ones recently?
I just finished reading "The Red Tent" by Anita Diamant and I really liked it.
I've heard good things about that book. I'll have to check it out.
It's really good! I'm sure you'll like it.
Thanks for the recommendation!
No problem!
